name: MIS Visitors by Person ID
description:
This is an establishment based report prompted by the visitor Person ID. It will show all previous visits, all associations, Global and Local restrictions for that person. Scheduled visits for the Person can be viewed in the OR report Visits List by Person Id

VIS0014 - v2.0 Last Modified: 31/07/23

dataset.name: Visitor Restrictions - local
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.PERSON_ID, AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.LAST_NAME, AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.FIRST_NAME, AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.L_VISITOR_RESTRICT_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.LOCAL_RESTRICT_ACTIVE_FLAG, AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.RESTRICTION_DESC, CASE WHEN AT_VISITOR_LOC_RES_START_DATE.DAY_DATE = (TO_DATE('31-12-9000 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) THEN NULL ELSE AT_VISITOR_LOC_RES_START_DATE.DAY_DATE END AS VISITOR_LOCAL_RESTRICTION_ST36, CASE WHEN AT_VISITOR_LOC_RES_END_DATE.DAY_DATE = (TO_DATE('31-12-9000 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) THEN NULL ELSE AT_VISITOR_LOC_RES_END_DATE.DAY_DATE END AS VISITOR_LOCAL_RESTRICTION_EN34, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_STATUS FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_VISITOR_LOC_RES_START_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_VISITOR_LOC_RES_END_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_OTHER_CONTACTS AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2, BODIMIS.DIM_VISITOR_LOCAL_RESTRICTION AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR WHERE (AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.L_RESTRICT_START_DATE_SK = AT_VISITOR_LOC_RES_START_DATE.DATE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.L_RESTRICT_EXPIRY_DATE_SK = AT_VISITOR_LOC_RES_END_DATE.DATE_SK) AND (AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.OFFENDER_CONTACT_PERSON_ID_NK = AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.OFFENDER_CONTACT_PERSON_ID (+)) AND (AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.PERSON_ID = AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_DIM_VISITOR_LOC_RESTRIC.LOCAL_RESTRICT_ACTIVE_FLAG = (1)) AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID = (SELECT PERSON_ID FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Visitor Person Id:','N',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT PERSON_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, L_VISITOR_RESTRICT_TYPE, SURNAME, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, LOCAL_RESTRICT_ACTIVE_FLAG, RESTRICTION_DESC, VISITOR_LOCAL_RESTRICTION_ST36, VISITOR_LOCAL_RESTRICTION_EN34, ACTIVE_STATUS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Visitor Restrictions- global
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.LAST_NAME, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.FIRST_NAME, AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.RESTRICTION_TYPE, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.VISITOR_RESTRICT_ACTIVE_FLAG, AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.RESTRICTION_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_VISITOR_GLB_RES_START_DATE.DAY_DATE = (TO_DATE('31-12-9000 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) THEN NULL ELSE AT_VISITOR_GLB_RES_START_DATE.DAY_DATE END AS VISITOR_GLOBAL_RESTRICTION_S37, CASE WHEN AT_VISITOR_GLB_RES_END_DATE.DAY_DATE = (TO_DATE('31-12-9000 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')) THEN NULL ELSE AT_VISITOR_GLB_RES_END_DATE.DAY_DATE END AS VISITOR_GLOBAL_RESTRICTION_E35, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_STATUS FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_VISITOR_GLB_RES_START_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_VISITOR_GLB_RES_END_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR, BODIMIS.DIM_VISITOR_GLOBAL_RESTRICTION AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_OTHER_CONTACTS AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2 WHERE (AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.V_RESTRICT_EXPIRY_DATE_SK = AT_VISITOR_GLB_RES_END_DATE.DATE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.V_RESTRICT_START_DATE_SK = AT_VISITOR_GLB_RES_START_DATE.DATE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR_SK = AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR_SK (+)) AND (AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.PERSON_ID = AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS2.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND ((AT_DIM_VISITOR_GLOB_RESTRCTN.VISITOR_RESTRICT_ACTIVE_FLAG = (1)) AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_VISITOR.VISITOR_PERSON_ID = (SELECT PERSON_ID FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Visitor Person Id:','N',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT VISITOR_PERSON_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, RESTRICTION_TYPE, SURNAME, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, VISITOR_RESTRICT_ACTIVE_FLAG, RESTRICTION_DESCRIPTION, VISITOR_GLOBAL_RESTRICTION_S37, VISITOR_GLOBAL_RESTRICTION_E35, ACTIVE_STATUS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Visits - completed
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS.PERSON_ID, AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS.LAST_NAME, AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_VISIT_DATE.DAY_DATE, AT_VISIT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_VISIT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_VISIT_TYPE.CODE, AT_VISIT_TYPE.DESCRIPTION, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.VISIT_START_TIME, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.VISIT_END_TIME, AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS.RELATIONSHIP, AT_VISIT_EVENT.DESCRIPTION AS VISIT_VISITOR_EVENT_STATUS_D38, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_STATUS FROM BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_VISIT_DATE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_VISIT_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_VISIT_EVENT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_VISIT_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_OTHER_CONTACTS AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_VISIT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.VISIT_DATE_SK = AT_VISIT_DATE.DATE_SK) AND (BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.OTHER_CONTACT_SK = AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS.OTHER_CONTACT_SK (+)) AND (AT_VISIT_TYPE.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.VISIT_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_VISIT_EVENT.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_VISIT.EVENT_STATUS_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND AT_VISIT_OFFENDER_CONTACTS.PERSON_ID = (SELECT PERSON_ID FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Visitor Person Id:','N',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */)), dataset_ AS (SELECT PERSON_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, SURNAME, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DAY_DATE, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, CODE, DESCRIPTION, VISIT_START_TIME, VISIT_END_TIME, RELATIONSHIP, VISIT_VISITOR_EVENT_STATUS_D38, ACTIVE_STATUS FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All Associations
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.PERSON_ID, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.LAST_NAME, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.FIRST_NAME, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.RELATIONSHIP, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY dooc.offender_booking_sk, dooc.relationship ORDER BY dooc.active_flag DESC, dooc.address_flag DESC, dooc.mis_load_id DESC) AS row_seq_filter, dooc.*, CASE WHEN dooc.next_of_kin_flag = 'Y' THEN 'NEXTOFKIN' ELSE 'CONTACT' END AS Con_Addr_Type, CASE WHEN dooc.next_of_kin_flag = 'Y' THEN 'Next of Kin' ELSE 'Contact' END AS ConAddrTypeDesc FROM bodimis.dim_offender_other_contacts dooc) DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+)) AND (DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IS NULL OR DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND DT_OFFENDER_CONTACT_ADDRESS.PERSON_ID = (SELECT PERSON_ID FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Enter Visitor Person Id:','N',,Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */)), dataset_ AS (SELECT PERSON_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, RELATIONSHIP, ACTIVE_STATUS FROM dataset_base_)
